vsParam:
Ah, Sterk. A client wants some ingredients from a monster,
we are going to gather them!
Are there any guardians with you?
Guardians... Let's say Cresson can count as one in a pinch...

Wh-what do you mean by in a pinch!
I work super hard in training, OK!?

I see. You'll be safer with more guardians, right?
Can I go with you?

Uh, really!? That's great. I got to work alongside Sterk!
Please give me more advice!
Don't you have any other jobs?
We can be assured with you around!

No, don't mind it.
This is also what a knight should do.

Your words made me more motivated.
I won't let you down.

But, is it really OK for you?
We'll be counting on you then, OK?

Sure. Since I train with the guards,
I'm obligated to protect the students of the Academy. And...

... I've been doing much repairing lately. Being a guardian, which
is closer to what a knight does, would be a break for me.

Ha-ha, I understand.
In this case, we'd gladly take your offer!

Is that the monster... It seems gloomy.
Stay sharpâ€” It's coming!

We've done gathering!
Let's head back to the Academy!

Well done... Looks like you are already
capable of coping with real combat.

I didn't realize how powerful you've become,
and I don't think you need a guardian anymore...

Hee hee, are we? That's so great, [px]!
Sterk says we've become more powerful!

... Uh. I think this place will no longer
need knights pretty soon.

What? Wh-what are you talking about!
That's not going to happen! Knights are always needed!
Where did such demoralizing words come from!?
I'm glad to hear that, but...

Demoralizing words?
It's not strange that you think so.

Knights fight to protect people!
Kids dream about them. They are many kids' role models!

So... knights are there to give people dreams!
Such an occupation cannot disappear!

Sorry, I just made a joke.
Please forget it.

"To gives people dreams"?
I also... hope so. I wish that I can be one such knight.

It's just... This world needs knights more than my
world does... I'm having some mixed feelings...

What do you mean by... "this world needs knights
more than your world does"?

I mentioned it earlier... Knights in Arland are mainly
responsible for chores instead of protecting people.

And... the King we ought to protect,
is far more powerful and stronger than knights.

Th-this is... unbelievable...
What would such a king be like...

Hmm...
Sterk must have been through a lot...

But... In a way, shall we say that a world in no need of knights
is a safe and peaceful one?

Perhaps...
OK, we should probably go back to the Academy.

A world in no need of Sterk and knights...
How could such a thing happen?

But this is still our world... huh?
Alright, let's just end this topic. We should go back.
